issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfrRJYC4z6I](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DPfrRJYC4z6I) ### Comment > On youtube, the video of the ad is blocked, but the audio still plays, and a "skip ads" button comes up after a few seconds. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5ggpfglhkloo8oc8wkk8k44ogw04wk04vdfykfx694.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gpj-Mr56AwQ](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DGpj-Mr56AwQ) ### Comment > Not sure why this was marked as fixed? A few weeks later YouTube videos are still unplayable in Safari, either the video never loads or the site thinks I'm offline. Disabling AdGuard completely removes the problem. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1nml69sr53ogk4og0ksssw4wc8w08gg12ez8r9q8re.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1nml69sr53ogk4og0ksssw4wc8w08gg12ez8r9q8re.png?nc=1)

issue.title: fortune.com

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.title: kriptokoin.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.52

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://kriptokoin.com/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


The website has a new design so the rules below are now redundant.

```

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/32505
kriptokoin.com#@#.share-container
kriptokoin.com##.sidebar_inner > #text-75  


https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/39161

kriptokoin.com#?#.wpb_wrapper > div.widget_text:has(> strong:contains(/Reklam|BlockShow/)) 
/970x250-$image,domain=kriptokoin.com   
/Lunabit.gif$domain=kriptokoin.com 
kriptokoin.com#?#aside > div.sidebar_inner > div.widget_text:has(> strong:contains(Reklam)) 
/*-Banners$image,domain=kriptokoin.com  

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/78195
kriptokoin.com##.top-bar-ads  


https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/83086
kriptokoin.com#?#.wpb_wrapper > div.widget_text > div.textwidget > ins + script:upward(div.widget_text)  
kriptokoin.com##.widget_viewedimages ~ div.widget  
kriptokoin.com##a[href^="https://www.bitci.com/"]  
kriptokoin.com##.header-coins-container  
||kriptokoin.com/wp-content/uploads/*/728x100.jpg 
||wp.com/kriptokoin.com/wp-content/uploads/*/realbetis.jpg 


https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/9b849caddff116ae48f18bca9cdf80dc82d72c08
kriptokoin.com#?#div[class^="sidebar_inner"] > div.widget:has(> div.textwidget > p > a[target="_blank"])
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
